roleset.name: expose to radiation

example.name: ARG1
example.text: `` The -LCB- stones -RCB- that were irradiated in the U.S. are safe , '' says John Hickey , chief of the NRC operations branch , Washington .

example.name: all args
example.text: John irradiated his underwear with weapons - grade plutonium .

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: While the radioactive isotopes finding their way into pollen grains were relatively few , their irradiation of pollen from within the pollen grains was significant .

propbank.arg: of pollen from within the pollen grains

example.name: radiate-v
example.text: They radiated the tumor in the spine and so far they feel they have killed it .

example.name: radiate-v
example.text: We radiated the insect at three altitude levels .

example.name: radiate-v
example.text: I placed old-growth soil that had been radiated in the lab to kill its fungi in the final third of the planting holes .
example.amr: (p / place-01 :ARG0 (i / i) :ARG1 (s / soil :mod (o / old-growth) :ARG1-of (i2 / irradiate-01 :location (l / lab) :purpose (k / kill-01 :ARG1 (f / fungus :pl + :poss s)))) :ARG2 (h2 / hole :ARG1-of (i3 / include-91 :ARG2 (h / hole :purpose (p2 / plant-01)) :ARG3 (t / third :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value "-1")))))

example.name: radiate-v
example.text: After 63 removed lymph nodes I would also hesitate to radiate the pelvis .
example.amr: (h / hesitate-01 :ARG0 (i / i) :ARG1 (i2 / irradiate-01 :ARG1 (a / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "pelvis")) :time (a2 / after :op1 (r / remove-01 :ARG1 (a3 / anatomical-site :quant 63 :name (n2 / name :op1 "lymph" :op2 "node"))))) :mod (a4 / also))

roleset.note: IRRADIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'irradiate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from irradiate.01-v predicate notes)
